item.description:
Let's SUP!

Zapstix Surf Shop in Seabrook, NH is offering us a great group rental rate of $30 per person for the afternoon. Includes board, paddle, and wetsuit rental.

Depending on the surf conditions, we will either paddle down the road at Salisbury Beach, or if the surf is a little to big, in the bay behind Zapstix. I am hoping for the ocean paddling though!

Cost: $30

**update**

If you have your own gear you are more than welcome to come paddle with us for no fee of course! :) - if you do have your own board though, please specify in your RSVP so that I will know not to reserve a rental board for you

This is in combination with the SUP meetup group, there are already about a half dozen people signed up, but there are still plenty of spots available so I thought I would open it up here and see if anyone is interested.

I will be bringing my surfboard along to surf afterwards if there is any surf around. be fun to get in the water with all this lousy weather lately.
item.name: Paddle - SUP
